articles.content:
Greetings to Lebanese President 
    Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- President of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK Kim Yong Nam Sunday sent a message of greetings to Emile Lahoud, president of Lebanon, on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of its independence.
 The message wholeheartedly wished the president and people of Lebanon greater success in their work for the sovereignty and prosperity of the country.

articles.content:
Greetings to Lebanese Prime Minister 
    Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Cabinet Pak Pong Ju sent a message of greetings to Omar Karami, prime minister of Lebanon, on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of its independence.
 The message sincerely wished the prime minister and the people of Lebanon greater success in their work for the stability and prosperity of the country.

UNGA President Leaves
articles.content:
UNGA President Leaves
    Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- President of the UN General Assembly Jean Ping, minister of State and concurrently minister of Foreign Affairs, Cooperation and Francophone of Gabon, and his party left here today.
 They were seen off at the airport by Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Choe Su Hon.    
 During their stay they visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, the Grand People's Study House, the Monument to the Three Charters for National Reunification, the Tower of the Juche Idea and the Three Revolution Exhibition, etc.

articles.title: Paek Nam Sun Congratulates Tunisian FM
articles.content:
Paek Nam Sun Congratulates Tunisian FM
    Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a congratulatory message to Abdelbaki el Hermassi upon his appointment as foreign minister of Tunisia.
 The message expressed conviction that the friendly relations between the two countries would grow stronger and wished him success in his responsible work.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Congratulates Hungarian Prime Minister
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Congratulates Hungarian Prime Minister
    Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Cabinet Pak Pong Ju sent a congratulatory message to Ferenc Gyurcsany on his appointment as prime minister of the Republic of Hungary.
 He sincerely wished the prime minister success in his responsible work for the economic development of the country and the welfare of its people.

DPRK Military Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
DPRK Military Delegation Leaves
    Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- A DPRK military delegation headed by Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Kim Yong Chun, member of the National Defence Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and chief of the General Staff of the KPA, left here Saturday to visit the Republic of Cuba.
 It was seen off at the airport by KPA Vice Marshal Kim Il Chol, member of the NDC of the DPRK and minister of the People's Armed Forces, KPA general officers, Cuban Ambassador e.p. to the DPRK Ruben Perez Valdes and Giraldo Abreu Morales, military attache of the Cuban embassy here.
